title: Add esbuild configuration to a project
description: Add esbuild configuration to a project.

project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up a esbuild for?

main.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the main entry file. Defaults to `<project-root>/src/main.ts` or `<project-root>src/index.ts`, whichever is found.

tsConfig.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the tsconfig file to build with. Defaults to `<project-root>/tsconfig.app.json` or `<project-root>/tsconfig.lib.json`, whichever is found.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project.

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`.
